Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Yale
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th. 

Allow extra travel time. 

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 119th between Wentworth and Yale.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at 35th/Archer
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to police department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to police department activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
